experience.title: Senior Front End Developer
experience.description: As a Lead Front-End Developer, I led the design and development of flagship web applications across e-commerce and healthcare domains. I collaborated with a cross-functional team, including 3 UI/UX designers, to build scalable and maintainable front-end architectures. I introduced a design system that reduced UI inconsistencies by 60% and improved development efficiency by 40%. My responsibilities also included conducting user research and usability testing to ensure our products delivered a seamless and user-centered experience.
achievements: Delivered 8+ full-scale projects as the primary front-end developer, covering multi-role dashboards, transactional systems, and real-time updates
Developed key modules for Bringly, including product listings, order management, driver tracking, and integrated payment systems
Built a scalable appointment and patient record system for a health management dashboard, supporting role-based access (admin, doctor, medical center)

experience.title: Front End Developer
experience.description: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design intuitive and engaging user experiences for various client projects. Created wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs for web and mobile applications.
achievements: Designed interfaces for 12+ client projects across fintech, healthcare, and e-commerce
Improved conversion rates by an average of 22% through data-driven design iterations
Mentored junior designers and facilitated design thinking workshops
